items.title: Nearly 4,000 NASA employees opt to leave agency through deferred resignation program
items.description: The employees who have chosen to leave the agency amount to about 20% of NASA's workforce.

items.title: Taiwanese political gridlock endures as China-friendly party survives recall vote
items.description: A months-long recall effort to oust lawmakers considered pro-Chinese has failed in the self-governing island's legislature.
